title: SBI SMS Rewards points scam.
selftext:
Came across this phishing scam today.
Guys please be on the lookout and tell your parents and older colleagues about it. 

Hopefully did my part to put a stop to it.
comments: Lol never saw someone with that much of rewards points
Report SMS as fraud in  your app. If possible submit a complaint to TRAI.
bro didnt even try to hide
That’s the whole point of it.
cleaned_text: sbi sms rewards points scam came across phishing scam today guys please lookout tell parents older colleagues hopefully part put stop
